channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Three generations of one family want to move to the East Midlands, and the task of finding a new home for them all has fallen on mum, grandma, and Ginny Buckley. Away from looking at houses, Ginny meets a volunteer group helping to restore the area's local canals and their footpaths so that wildlife can thrive and the public can enjoy a safer stroll.
